sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './App.css'; import { Icon, Table } from 'semantic-ui-react' import 'semantic-ui-css/semantic.min.css' class App extends Component { state = { restaurants: [] } componentDidMount() { this.getRestaurants() } getRestaurants = _ => { fetch('http://localhost:5000/restaurants') .then(response => response.json()) .then(response => this.setState({ restaurants: response.data })) .catch(err => console.error(err)); } renderRestaurant = ({ restrntID, Name, Phone, Address, Website, Delivery }) => {Name} {Phone} {Address} {Website} {Delivery} render() { const { restaurants } = this.state return (
Name Status Notes No Name Specified Unknown None Jimmy Approved None Jamie Unknown Requires call Jill Unknown None
{restaurants.map(this.renderRestaurant)}
) } } export default App;
